title: CM announces two months remission to prisoners
content:
LAHORE, Mar 14 (APP):Punjab Chief Minister Sardar Usman Buzdar has announced two moths remission in sentences of prisoners in the province.
The provincial government had taken the step with regard to prevention from
coronavirus, said a handout issued here on Saturday.
Usman Buzdar said the decision would result in release of hundreds of prisoners
as the Punjab government would take every step which could help in dealing
with coronavirus spread.
